SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Arts?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Arts is arc {Engineering}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Computer Science?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Computer Science is arc {Engineering}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Social Sciences} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 321? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {332} from {Arts} to {Social Sciences}, a flow of {395} from {Engineering} to {Social Sciences}, a flow of {348} from {Computer Science} to {Arts}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 92? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {26} from {Social Sciences} to {Computer Science}, a flow of {88} from {Computer Science} to {Social Sciences}, a flow of {38} from {Engineering} to {Computer Science}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 92 and 213? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {105} from {Social Sciences} to {Arts}, a flow of {117} from {Social Sciences} to {Engineering}, a flow of {97} from {Arts} to {Computer Science}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Arts to Social Sciences or from Social Sciences to Arts?
NC.A: The flow from {Arts} to {Social Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Arts to Social Sciences, from Engineering to Computer Science, or from Computer Science to Engineering?
NC.A: The flow from {Arts} to {Social Sciences} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Computer Science}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Engineering} and {Social Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Arts, Arc Computer Science, Arc Social Sciences, Arc Engineering}.
